LanguageData.VFEI_GoldDrop.label: доставити золота
LanguageData.VFEI_GoldDrop.description: Call for a drop of 50 gold.
LanguageData.VFEI_PlasteelDrop.label: доставити пласталь
LanguageData.VFEI_PlasteelDrop.description: Call for a drop of 55 plasteel.
LanguageData.VFEI_JadeDrop.label: доставити нефрит
LanguageData.VFEI_JadeDrop.description: Call for a drop of 100 jade.
LanguageData.VFEI_UraniumDrop.label: доставити уран
LanguageData.VFEI_UraniumDrop.description: Call for a drop of 80 uranium.
LanguageData.VFEI_ClothDrop.label: доставити тканину
LanguageData.VFEI_ClothDrop.description: Call for a drop of 330 cloth.
LanguageData.VFEI_WoodDrop.label: доставити деревину
LanguageData.VFEI_WoodDrop.description: Call for a drop of 400 wood.
LanguageData.VFEI_SynthreadDrop.label: доставити синтволокно
LanguageData.VFEI_SynthreadDrop.description: Call for a drop of 125 synthread.
LanguageData.VFEI_HerbalMedDrop.label: доставити трав'яні ліки
LanguageData.VFEI_HerbalMedDrop.description: Call for a drop of 40 herbal medicine.
LanguageData.VFEI_MedDrop.label: доставити ліки
LanguageData.VFEI_MedDrop.description: Call for a drop of 25 medicine.
LanguageData.VFEI_DevilstrandDrop.label: доставити дияволокно
LanguageData.VFEI_DevilstrandDrop.description: Call for a drop of 90 devilstrand.
LanguageData.VFEI_HyperweaveDrop.label: доставити гіпертканину
LanguageData.VFEI_HyperweaveDrop.description: Call for a drop of 55 hyperweave.
LanguageData.VFEI_ChemfuelDrop.label: достаивти пальне
LanguageData.VFEI_ChemfuelDrop.description: Call for a drop of 220 chemfuel.
LanguageData.VFEI_ComponentDrop.label: доставити компоненти
LanguageData.VFEI_ComponentDrop.description: Call for a drop of 15 components.
LanguageData.VFEI_ComponentSpacerDrop.label: доставити передові компоненти
LanguageData.VFEI_ComponentSpacerDrop.description: Call for a drop of 3 advanced components.
LanguageData.VFEI_HEShellsDrop.label: доставити набої
LanguageData.VFEI_HEShellsDrop.description: Call for a drop of 10 high-explosive shells.
LanguageData.VFEI_NobleFoodDrop.label: доставити їжу для шляхтича
LanguageData.VFEI_NobleFoodDrop.description: Call for a drop of 15 lavish meals.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallTrooperPlatoon.label: викликати загін десантників
LanguageData.VFEI_CallTrooperPlatoon.description: Call a group of 8 light troopers to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallJanissaryPlatoon.label: викликати загін яничар
LanguageData.VFEI_CallJanissaryPlatoon.description: Call a group of 8 professional janissaries to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallCataphractPlatoon.label: викликати катафрактаріїв
LanguageData.VFEI_CallCataphractPlatoon.description: Call a group of 8 heavy cataphracts to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallTechfriar.label: викликати техножреців
LanguageData.VFEI_CallTechfriar.description: Call a techfriar to assist you for 4 days. This guildmember can only do research-related tasks. You can control him as though he is your own colonists. You are required to keep him safe.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallLaborerUnion.label: викликати найманих працівників
LanguageData.VFEI_CallLaborerUnion.description: Call a group of 12 laborers to assist you for 4 days. These workers can only do general labor tasks. You can control them as though they were your own colonists. You are required to keep them safe.
LanguageData.VFEI_StrikerTurretDrop.label: викликати ударну турель
LanguageData.VFEI_StrikerTurretDrop.description: Call for a drop of three striker turrets to aid you in battle. After they fire all their ammo, striker turrets self-detonate.
LanguageData.VFEI_BurnoutShieldDrop.label: викликати плаючий щит
LanguageData.VFEI_BurnoutShieldDrop.description: Call for a drop of a burnout low shield to aid you in battle. It activates where it lands and will last 30 seconds before deactivating.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallEvacShuttle.label: викликати евакуаційний шатл
LanguageData.VFEI_CallEvacShuttle.description: Call an armed shuttle for your own use. It will transport colonists, items, and animals anywhere you like within 40 world tiles. It will stay in the area only for a brief moment.
LanguageData.VFEI_StoneDrop.label: доставити камінь
LanguageData.VFEI_StoneDrop.description: Call for a drop of 500 random stone bricks.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallStellicGuards.label: викликати гвардію стеларха
LanguageData.VFEI_CallStellicGuards.description: Call a group of 6 stellic guards, ranged and melee, to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallImperialRegiment.label: викликати імперський полк
LanguageData.VFEI_CallImperialRegiment.description: Call a group of 10 janissaries and 6 heavy cataphracts that will arrive in an armed shuttle, to aid you in battle. You cannot control them, but they will help you eliminate any threats in the area. They will leave after all threats are eliminated.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallOrbitalSlicingBeam.label: викликати "Сонячний промінь"
LanguageData.VFEI_CallOrbitalSlicingBeam.description: Call an orbital slicing beam from an imperial flagship in orbit. This beam will travel in a direction specified by you, burning everything it touches.
LanguageData.VFEI_CallAbsolver.label: викликати вбивцю "скорпіон"
LanguageData.VFEI_CallAbsolver.description: Call an absolver to assist you for 4 days. This guildmember is a master assassin and will not perform any tasks other than killing. You can control him as though he is your own colonists. If an absolver dies, a new one will replace them immediately, inheriting the remaining contract time.
